links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=10*exp(1)/Pi; for (n=0, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b061360.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 21 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 07 2001
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 18 2008 at the suggestion of _R. J. Mathar_
